09:31 <inch\_> Hi. I have a page with an object containing some metadata. Is there any way to tell xwiki not to show the object instead of the page when viewing the page?

09:52 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
09:57 <inch\_> has joined #xwiki  
10:05 <inch\_> Hi. I i have a page with an object containing metadata, but now when I view the page, i see the object data instead of the content of the page. Is there any way to show the content instead of the object?  
10:16 <rafj> has joined #xwiki  
10:17 <rafj> has quit  
10:22 <Pbas> Hello: /bin/view/yourspace/yourPage?viewer=code or remove your classSheets and class Template from your class page? It's depend what is your use case  
10:25 <vmassol> has quit  
10:26 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
10:37 <inch\_> I'm trying to include another page using the display macro, but all i get is the object instead of the content of the page. viewer=code shows the content in xwiki-syntax  
10:39 <Pbas> Remove your classSheets and class Template from your class (if you don't use it)?  
10:40 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
10:47 <vmassol> has quit  
11:40 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
11:50 <vmassol> has quit  
11:52 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
12:24 <vmassol> has quit  
12:36 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
12:41 <inch\_> thanks Pbas, that worked :)  
12:44 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
13:28 <Pbas> np :)  
14:18 <Aison> has joined #xwiki  
14:19 <Aison> hello, I tried to upgrade to xwiki 8.4.3  
14:20 <Aison> in the xwiki upgrade process it tries to upgrade XWiki Enterprise Flavor - Main Wiki  
14:20 <Aison> When I try to continue, I always get Found error  
14:36 <tmortagne> Aison: that would mean your XWiki instance cannot access the repository, maybe you need to configure some proxy  
14:37 <Aison> xwiki runs on a server with direct internet connection  
14:39 <Aison> and I did not change anything on extension.repositories  
14:39 <Aison> strange...  
14:45 <tmortagne> the repositories looks ok  
14:46 <abusenius> has joined #xwiki  
14:47 <tmortagne> just tested a 8.3 install from scratch and "XWiki Enterprise Flavor - Main Wiki " install works fine on my side  
14:47 <tmortagne> Aison:  
14:52 <abusenius> has quit  
14:55 <abusenius> has joined #xwiki  
15:02 <Aison> ok, I will test it again later
